DOC.brief_summary: This phase I/II study side effect best dose Z-208 patient advance hepatocellular carcinoma
DOC.brief_title: Phase I/II Study Z-208 Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma ( HCC )
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , dose-escalation study PhaseI Treatments repeat 28 day 1 course unacceptable toxicity Cohort 3 patient receive escalate dos Z-208 maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) determine . The MTD define dose precede 1 3 patient experience dose-limiting toxicity . PhaseII Treatments repeat 28 day 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Histologically cytologically confirm hepatocellular carcinoma At least one measurable site disease accord RECIST criterion irradiate . ChildPugh classification A & B ECOG performance status 01 Life expectancy 90 day Adequate organ function define follow criterion , Hemoglobin ≥ 8.0 g/dL WBC ≥ 3,000/mm^3 < 12,000/mm^3 Absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1,500/mm^3 Platelet count ≥ 50,000/mm^3 AST ALT ≤ 5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) Albumin ≥ 2.8 g/dL Bilirubin ≤ 2.0 mg/dL Creatinine ≤ 1.5 time ULN Must provide write informed consent prior implementation study assessment procedure Exclusion criterion Patients receive treatment follow within specify timeframe ; Any surgical procedure , radiofrequency ablation , intraarterial chemotherapy within 30 day prior sign ICF , treatment transfusion , albumin preparation , GCSF within 15 day prior sign ICF CNS involvement must complete appropriate treatment Prior deep vein thrombosis Has ascites , pleural effusion pericardial fluid refractory Active clinically serious infection exclude chronic hepatitis Any history deep vein thrombosis , pulmonary embolism , myocardial infraction , cerebrovascular accident Allergy hypersensitivity Vitamin A Women pregnant breast feeding
